Smarty {html_options} function plugin

Type: function
Name: html_options
Input:

  • name (optional) - string default "select"
  • values (required if no options supplied) - array
  • options (required if no values supplied) - associative array
  • selected (optional) - string default not set
  • output (required if not options supplied) - array Purpose: Prints the list of <option> tags generated from the passed parameters {html_image} (Smarty online manual) array Smarty string smarty_function_escape_special_chars()
